title: Coimbra again, new ID "Resemblance"
content:
A year ago I posted on these boards a subject about the new ID for the city of Coimbra.

[Google Cache](http://web.archive.org/web/20071108234446/http:/216.239.59.104/search?q=cache:T0ufGaXrX6oJ:www.typophile.com/cgibin/discus.pl%3Fpg%3Dnext%26topic%3D29%26page%3D8780+typophile+quintiles&hl=pt-PT).

Today a new ID was released, and new bomb :)

Check the image attached :). This time I think it’s more than a resemblance... I guess my city will soon be a case study :)

| Attachment | Size |
| --- | --- |
| [coimbra.jpg](http://web.archive.org/web/20071108234446/http:/typophile.com/files/coimbra.jpg) | 259.51 KB |

 [‹ Who has examples of the 'florin' in use?](http://web.archive.org/web/20071108234446/http:/www.typophile.com/node/13226 "Go to previous forum topic") [Alternative to Mrs. Eaves? ›](http://web.archive.org/web/20071108234446/http:/www.typophile.com/node/13084 "Go to next forum topic")
author: adriano

comments.content:
Do you also know! What kind of people are running our city?

This Prata man should be kicked with a dead cat until it mew...

Jorge Marcedo  
Coimbra | Portugal
Ooch, that’s a nasty rip-off! I feel ashamed as a graphic designer, when people in the same business publish low watermarks like this.
